Tokens.BonusSpiritForChargedAbilities_label: Bonus Spirit Power for Charged Abilities
Tokens.shifting_veil_bonus: Spirit Power, Speed, and Spirit Resist
Tokens.upgrade_ability_power_shard_active: Reset the cooldown of the imbued non-ultimate ability.
Tokens.upgrade_ability_refresher_desc: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.
Tokens.upgrade_absorbing_armor_desc: Taking heavy hits of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from an enemy reduces a random ability cooldown.
Tokens.upgrade_acolytes_glove_desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_active_reload_desc: While reloading, pressing {g:citadel_keybind:'Reload'} during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate, Bullet Lifesteal and Move Speed.
Tokens.upgrade_ammo_scavenger_desc:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed
Tokens.upgrade_aoe_root_active: Throw a vacuum grenade, pulling all enemies into a small area and applying Slowing Hex.
Tokens.upgrade_aprounds_desc: Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.
Tokens.upgrade_arcane_extension_desc: Imbue an ability to increase its Duration.
Tokens.upgrade_arcane_surge_desc: When you Dash-Jump the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
Tokens.upgrade_arctic_blast_desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.
Tokens.upgrade_banshee_slugs_headshots_desc: Landing a Headshot will reduce the target's Bullet and Spirit Resist. Also applies Healing Reduction on the target.
Tokens.upgrade_berserker_desc: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.
Tokens.upgrade_blood_tribute_desc: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'}, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.
Tokens.upgrade_boxing_glove_desc: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for {s:LifestealHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestealHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura_desc: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.
Tokens.upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder_desc: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.
Tokens.upgrade_burst_fire_desc: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.
Tokens.upgrade_capacitor_desc: Launch a projectile that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage, removes all their non-ultimate buffs and applies a strong slow that recovers over time.
Tokens.upgrade_cardio_calibrator_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Move Speed penalties.
Tokens.upgrade_chain_lightning_desc: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
Tokens.upgrade_cheat_death_unkillable_passive:
When you would take lethal damage, instead become temporarily death immune.

While death immune, you deal reduced damage, have reduced healing and move slower.
Tokens.upgrade_chonky_desc: After not taking damage for {s:RestoreDelay}s, gain {s:HealLifePercentOutOfCombat}% Max Health Regen.
Tokens.upgrade_chonky_high_health_passive_desc: When you are above {s:HealthThreshold}% health, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Move Speed.
Tokens.upgrade_cloaking_device_active_ambush_de: Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_cloaking_device_active_desc: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Tokens.upgrade_close_quarter_combat_desc: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.
Tokens.upgrade_close_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.
Tokens.upgrade_cold_front_desc: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.
Tokens.upgrade_colossus_desc: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.
Tokens.upgrade_containment_desc:
Slows movement of enemy target. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.
Tokens.upgrade_cooldown_reduction_desc: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_corpse_explosion_desc: Kills or assists cause an explosion where the victim dies. Kills against heroes have greater radius and damage.
Tokens.upgrade_counterspell_desc: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry gain Move Speed and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_crackshot_desc: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.
Tokens.upgrade_critshot_desc:
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.
Tokens.upgrade_crushing_fists_desc:
Your {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.
Tokens.upgrade_damage_recycler_desc: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.
Tokens.upgrade_debuff_reducer_desc: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
Tokens.upgrade_deflecting_armor_desc: Gain a chance to either deflect incoming bullets, preventing all {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} or prevent all on-hit effects from bullets.
Tokens.upgrade_discord_desc:
Apply Spirit Resistance and an aura on a friendly target that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage to enemies proportional to their max health.
Can be self cast.
Tokens.upgrade_divine_barrier_desc:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.
Tokens.upgrade_diviners_kevlar_desc: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain a Barrier and temporary Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_dps_aura_active_desc: Provides {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MoveSpeed'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'} to you and nearby allies. Minions get double value.
Tokens.upgrade_dps_aura_desc: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.
Tokens.upgrade_enchanted_holsters_desc:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.
Tokens.upgrade_escalating_exposure_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.
Tokens.upgrade_ethereal_bullets_desc: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use. Until your next reload, your bullets deal bonus Spirit Damage based on your Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_express_shot_desc: After not attacking for {s:AbilityCooldown}s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.
Tokens.upgrade_fervor_passive: While you are below {s:LowHealthThreshold}% health, you gain stat bonuses.
Tokens.upgrade_fleetfoot_boots_passive_desc: Removes the Move Speed penalty while shooting.
Tokens.upgrade_focus_lens_desc: Target an enemy to silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.
Tokens.upgrade_fury_trance_active: Grants Fire Rate and Spirit Resistance but Silences you and disables stamina usage and regeneration.
Tokens.upgrade_glass_cannon2_desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
Tokens.upgrade_glass_cannon_desc: Each hero kill grants permanent Fire Rate (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.
Tokens.upgrade_glitch_desc: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.
Tokens.upgrade_greater_withering_whip_desc: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_guardian_ward_desc:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.
Tokens.upgrade_headhunter_desc: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.
Tokens.upgrade_headshot_booster2_desc: Upon landing a headshot reduce target's Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_headshot_booster_desc: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.
Tokens.upgrade_heal_on_level_desc: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.
Tokens.upgrade_healbane_desc: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.
Tokens.upgrade_healbuff_desc:
Applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} to yourself or an ally grants the target {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.
Tokens.upgrade_healing_booster_desc: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by {s:HealAmpRegenPercent}%.
Tokens.upgrade_health_stimpak_desc: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_hollow_point_rounds_desc: When you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, deal additional Weapon Damage and your bullets reduce enemy Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_imbued_duration_extender_desc: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_improved_bullet_armor_desc: When below {s:HealthThreshold}% health, gain additional Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_infuser_desc: Gain Spirit Lifesteal and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_inhibitor_desc: Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing damage and apply healing reduction.
Tokens.upgrade_intensifying_clip_desc: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.
Tokens.upgrade_juggernaut_slow_desc: Enemies that shoot you have their Fire Rate slowed.
Tokens.upgrade_kinetic_sash_desc: When you Dash-Jump you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.
Tokens.upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets_desc: Your next Melee attack heals you. You heal for {s:NonHeroHealPct}% of the value against non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_long_range_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_burst_desc: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than {s:MinimumDamage} damage to deal additional damage.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_carpet_desc:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_reach_desc: Imbue an ability to increase its range and effect radius.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_shield_desc: While you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, gain bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'} and Cooldown Reduction.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_shock_desc: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than {s:MinimumDamage} damage to deal additional damage.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_slow_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed reduced.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_storm_desc: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_tempo_desc: Imbue an ability to reduce its Cooldown.
Tokens.upgrade_magic_vulnerability_desc: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.
Tokens.upgrade_medic_bullets_desc: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.
Tokens.upgrade_melee_charge_desc: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage.
Tokens.upgrade_melee_rebuttal_desc: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased melee damage.
Tokens.upgrade_mystic_regeneration_desc: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_non_player_bonus_sacrifice_desc: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for {s:BonusSoulsPct}% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.
Tokens.upgrade_personal_rejuvenator_desc: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.
Tokens.upgrade_phantom_strike_desc: Teleport to an enemy target and pull them to the ground. Dealing damage, Move speed reduction and Disarm.
Tokens.upgrade_pristine_emblem_desc: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above {s:EnemyLifeThreshold}% health.
Tokens.upgrade_proc_silence_debuff_desc: Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing spirit damage.
Tokens.upgrade_proc_silence_desc: Your bullets build up to a Silence. Victims are immune to the build up for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after silence expires.
Tokens.upgrade_quick_silver_desc: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use.
Tokens.upgrade_rebirth_passive: If you die, after {s:RespawnDelay}s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.
Tokens.upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration_active_de:
Purge all non-ultimate negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, heal yourself and gain a move speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield_desc: While you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}.
Tokens.upgrade_reinforcing_casings_desc: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.
Tokens.upgrade_rescue_beam_desc: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_resonant_healing_desc: Heal and gain bonus Movement Speed for a short duration when you cast an ability.
Tokens.upgrade_restorative_locket_active_desc:
When an enemy uses an ability within {s:Radius}m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish {s:StaminaToRestore} stamina points. Can be self-cast.
Tokens.upgrade_return_fire_desc: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.
Tokens.upgrade_ricochet_desc: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.
Tokens.upgrade_rocket_booster_desc:
Launch yourself high into the air and grant yourself a Barrier. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.

Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if attacked by enemy Hero.
Tokens.upgrade_rupture_desc: Inflict damage over time to a target, dealing damage based on their current health.
Tokens.upgrade_self_bubble_desc:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain Spirit Power, Move Speed, and Spirit Resist.
Can be canceled early.
Activation cancels any active ability.
Tokens.upgrade_sharpshooter_desc: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Tokens.upgrade_silencer_active: For the next {s:AbilityDuration}s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.
Tokens.upgrade_siphon_bullets_desc_passive2: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal {s:StealPerKill} stacks of health if a siphoned target dies and lose {s:StackLostPerDeath} stacks if you die.
Tokens.upgrade_slowing_bullets_desc: Your bullets build up a Movement Slow on enemies.
Tokens.upgrade_spellbreaker_desc: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.
Tokens.upgrade_spellshield_desc: Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.
Tokens.upgrade_spellslinger_headshots_part1_des: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.
Tokens.upgrade_spellslinger_headshots_part2_des: Landing headshots against the target reduces their Spirit Resist further.
Tokens.upgrade_spirit_bubble_desc: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.
Tokens.upgrade_spirit_burn_desc:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within {s:DamageThresholdDuration}s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.
Tokens.upgrade_spirit_sap_desc: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_spirit_snatch_desc: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
Tokens.upgrade_split_shot_desc:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.
Tokens.upgrade_superacolytes_glove_desc: After dealing an accumulated {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage.
Tokens.upgrade_superior_stamina_passive: Allows an additional use of Air Jump or Air Dash before landing.
Tokens.upgrade_suppressor_desc: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also reduce their Fire Rate.
Tokens.upgrade_surging_power_active: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.
Tokens.upgrade_target_stun_desc: Apply a Stun after {s:StunDelay}s. Stun duration is increased against airborne targets.
Tokens.upgrade_targeted_silence_desc:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration. Affected enemies also have their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power reduced for a longer duration.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_bleed_desc: Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_damage_pulse_desc: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_defense_shredders_desc: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_overflow_desc: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_purge_desc: When below {s:HealthThreshold}% health, gain additional Spirit Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_tech_range_desc: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
Tokens.upgrade_thermal_detonator_desc:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and reduces enemy Bullet Resist.

{s:NonHeroReductionPercent}% less effective vs non-heroes.
Tokens.upgrade_toxic_bullets_desc: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.
Tokens.upgrade_trophy_collector_desc: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.
Tokens.upgrade_ultimate_burst_desc: Damage from your ultimate applies a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} and deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} after a short delay.
Tokens.upgrade_ultimate_burst_hint: This effect can only trigger once per target per ultimate, and cannot activate on ultimates with charges.
Tokens.upgrade_unstoppable_desc:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_veil_walker_desc: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, Heal and increased Move Speed.
Tokens.upgrade_vex_barrier_desc: Automatically restores one stamina and gain a Barrier when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.
Tokens.upgrade_warp_stone_desc: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.
Tokens.upgrade_weapon_backstabber_desc: Attacking enemies from behind with your weapon or melee opens a wound dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} and reducing their bullet resist. During this time, if you or any allies are near the target, will see them through walls and be given {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.
Tokens.upgrade_weapon_shielding_desc: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.
Tokens.upgrade_withering_whip_desc: Target an enemy to reduce their Fire Rate.
